argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | vcrinv.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` W ) |
| 2 |  | vcrinv.2 | |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) |
| 3 |  | vcrinv.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | vcrinv.4 | |- Z = ( GId ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_vcm | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) = ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) G A ) ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_vcgrp | |- ( W e. CVecOLD -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_grpolinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) G A ) = Z ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` A ) G A ) = Z ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) = Z ) |
